# mrtrix Package: 
The goal of `mrtrix` is to provide provides functionality of the MRTrix3 <http://www.mrtrix.org/> software for MRI analysis

## Installation

You can install `mrtrix` from GitHub with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("muschellij2/mrtrix")
```
